p: Culicoides species were not observed feeding in the zoo, but females of C. guttipennis were collected from a dead colobus monkey, Colobus guereza RÃ¼ppell (Haplorrhini: Cercopithecidae), (one of two animals examined) and a dead golden-headed lion tamarin, Leontopithecus chrysomelas (Kuhl) (Haplorrhini: Cebidae), (one of three animals examined) in the Greenville Zoo. C. husseyi Wirth & Blanton was collected from one of four unidentified, abandoned bird nests in the Greenville Zoo.
